metadata.description: Cram school teacher Ninomiya just got dumped by his boyfriends after being told 'it’s boring being with you'. After losing all of his self-esteem, the person who appears in front of him is a radiantly handsome man, Sada. Ninomiya gets asked out by him and spends a night with him but… Flirty Sada and serious Ninomiya, the scary eyes Takama and flashy-looking Senba… Handsome x dull boy couples unveil the 'I am your senpai!' series!
metadata.name: Boring Ninomiya-san (Yaoi Manga)
